title: virusfonts release new 32 weight font family BOURGEOIS
content:
Submitted by [dan\_reynolds](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808070115/http:/typophile.com/user/1085 "View user profile.") : 23.Dec.2005 4.40am 

[from Virus Fonts]

BOURGEOIS FONT  
+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+  
FONT RELEASE: BOURGEOIS  
This clean looking sans was originally drawn in three weights for the Mori Art Museum in Japan. ( [www.mori.art.museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808070115/http:/www.mori.art.museum/ "www.mori.art.museum")), Bourgeois has been now been released as a major 32 weight family. It is not the most experimental font we have designed (it has a very light virusfonts touch to it) but it is certainly one of the most usable, well crafted and mature. We hope you will find that suitable for a number of uses, both text and display, please check the virusfonts website at [www.virusfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808070115/http:/www.virusfonts.com/ "www.virusfonts.com") for specimen sheets and pricing details.  
+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+\_+
author: dan_reynolds
